# A Report

This is a report that contains R code.

```{r}
library(gt)

gt(exibble) |>
  tab_options(quarto.disable_processing = TRUE)
```

This can include an email message.

:::{.email}

Hello,

This is an HTML message by default. It is rendered by the **blastula** package when using R. 
:::
